message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to your business. Given its potential, I'm initially offering it at $2,000,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $2,000,000 price point. I am willing to pay up to $1,800,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value finding a good fit for this product, $2,000,000 represents the absolute floor in terms of what I can accept.  Is there any flexibility in your budget to meet that?
